question:

Binod idolizes playing the banjo. Modu endures playing saxophone. Harjyot enjoys dolphins. Dillan enjoys tea. Hogan derides lions. Jardine thrives on the color cyan. Fawaz is addicted to popcorn. Peiyan endorses rollerblades. Torin treasures painting miniatures. Akan thrives on cupcakes. Marcello is devoted to airplanes. Humza sneers at playing basketball. Montague begrudges travel blogging. Avani idolizes sculpting. Kez hates tractors. Faisal hates the color peach. Cody enjoys dancing salsa. Orlando finds pleasure in religion. Adrien bears playing the banjo. Rui is apathetic about martial arts. Rubhan brushes off painting miniatures. Reilly adores music. Maximus reviles canoeing. Calley finds joy in salsa. Areez tolerates the color khaki. Guillaume waves away spiders. Fergal adores segways. Rajan reviles singing opera. Lloyde exults making the bed. Phinehas pines for the color sapphire. Scott finds joy in ostriches. Wilkie finds fulfillment in modern architecture. Vrishin thrives on the color eggplant. Sidney waves away modern architecture. Drew thrives on sailboats. Axel can’t bear curiosity. Abdul-Rehman damns playing lacrosse. Denzel worships the color orange. Campbel resents visiting theme parks. Dilan glorifies science. Wilkie adores meditation. 
Who thrives on the color cyan? Reply with a name enclosed within triple angle brackets, like <<<name>>>.
